hero.name: John Doe
hero.title: Senior Software Engineer
hero.tagline: {{yearsSince:careerStartYear}}+ years building systems at scale. Ex-Meta engineer with deep expertise in distributed systems and backend architecture.

metrics.label: Users Impacted
metrics.description: Instagram backend services serving global user base

highlights: Led Stories API migration from legacy PHP to Python/GraphQL, reducing p99 latency by 40%
Architected real-time notification system handling 1M+ events per second
Designed and implemented caching layer reducing database load by 60%
Mentored 4 engineers through onboarding, code reviews, and career development
On-call for Instagram Feed backend, resolving critical incidents affecting millions of users
Built monitoring integrations for AWS, GCP, and Azure cloud services
Developed Go-based agent plugins processing 100K+ metrics per second
Contributed to open-source integrations used by 10,000+ organizations
Improved test coverage from 60% to 90% across monitoring platform codebase

achievements.title: Stories API Migration
achievements.summary: Led complete rewrite of Instagram Stories backend from PHP to Python/GraphQL
achievements.impact: 40% latency reduction serving 500M+ daily active users
details: Designed migration strategy with zero-downtime cutover plan
Implemented feature flags for gradual rollout across 10% user segments
Built comprehensive monitoring dashboards for real-time migration tracking
Coordinated with 3 teams across Stories, Feed, and Infrastructure
Completed 6-month project 2 weeks ahead of schedule

achievements.title: Feed Ranking Optimization
achievements.summary: Optimized feed ranking API achieving significant performance gains
achievements.impact: Reduced p99 latency from 200ms to 120ms across all regions
details: Profiled and identified bottlenecks in ranking model inference
Implemented batch processing for ML model predictions
Designed intelligent caching strategy reducing redundant computations
Collaborated with ML team to optimize model serving architecture

achievements.title: Engineering Mentorship Program
achievements.summary: Established structured mentorship program for Instagram backend team
achievements.impact: Reduced new hire ramp-up time from 3 months to 6 weeks
details: Created onboarding documentation covering system architecture
Developed hands-on exercises for common backend workflows
Held weekly 1:1s with mentees to track progress and provide guidance
Two mentees promoted to E5 within 18 months

skillsSection.headline: Skills & Technologies
skillsSection.description: Deep expertise in distributed systems, backend architecture, and engineering leadership at scale.

projects.title: DistCache
projects.description: A high-performance distributed caching library for Go with consistent hashing, automatic sharding, and built-in metrics. Used in production at scale.

projects.title: GraphQL Type Generator
projects.description: CLI tool that generates type-safe Python clients from GraphQL schemas. Supports fragments, subscriptions, and custom scalars.

projects.title: Redis Cluster Operator
projects.description: Kubernetes operator for managing Redis clusters with automatic failover, scaling, and backup/restore capabilities.
